lyrics:
2 contributorscarousel lyricsverse 1
there are days that take too long
its those days i wish i had you right here in my arms

prechorus 1
im gettin lonely
im sick of waitin here for you
im gettin lonely
please come home cause i want to be with you
or maybe im a fool

chorus 1
baby
you still drive me crazy
nothings gonna change me
so you dont have to cry

verse 2
maybe i should take the blame
i guess a music man needs no shelter from the rain

prechorus 1
im gettin lonely
im sick of waitin here for you
im gettin lonely
please come home cause i want to be with you
or maybe im a fool
see buckcherry liveget tickets as low as 56you might also likechorus 1
baby
you still drive me crazy
nothings gonna change me
so you dont have to cry

chorus 2
oh yeah i said baby
you know that you saved me
your loves so amazing
youre never off my mind

bridge
alright cmon now yeah

bridge
nothings goin on
ive been gone for way too long
ill be right back in your arms
dont be afraid

prechorus 2
im gettin closer
im making my way back home to you
im gettin closer
i can see your face
and the light keeps shinin through
and baby what am i to do
chorus 1
baby
you still drive me crazy
nothings gonna change me
so you dont have to cry

chorus 3
no no no i said baby
you know that you saved me
your loves so amazing
youre never off my mind

bridgeoutro
oh i said nothings goin on
ive been gone for way too long
ill be right back in your arms
dont be afraidembed
